snippet: When the banking system works and lenders are actually lending, they can turn a $1 million deposit into much more than that sloshing around the economy.
abstract: When the banking system works and lenders are actually lending, they can turn a $1 million deposit into much more than that sloshing around the economy.

headline.main: How Lenders Make Money (and Create It Too)
